definition[0]: a political and economic system based on some ideas of socialism combined with democratic principles, such as personal freedom and government by elected representatives
definition[1]: a country with a government based on social democracy
definition[2]: a political and economic system based on socialism combined with democratic principles, such as freedom and government by elected representatives
example[0]: a nation where the values of social democracy are paramount
example[1]: incomes policies in the European social democracies
